doc.title: Privileged

value.content: Users are said to be privileged when they are granted additional rights to a system, or given ultimate access to content in a higher priority level when compared to normal users.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• Privilege (computing) on Wikipedia
  • Information Security Tutorial
